results.title: Rock Hudson's home movies
results.brief_description: This documentary takes the film-clip biography to new heights. Narrated by ‘Rock’ it wittily dissects the late star’s screen career in the light of the now known facts of his life— that he was gay and died from AIDS. The film presents a new image of Hollywood’s leading romantic screen idol of the 50s and 60s by closely examining his screen roles for ‘hidden meanings’ Both poignant and funny it exposes the ‘queerness’ the sits just below the surface of mainstream Hollywood film.

results.title: Romanov
results.creator_credit: Yuri Sokol, Sokol Films and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service
results.brief_description: The history of the influential royal Romanov family and their descendants search for identity are the subject of this SBS funded documentary. The tape covers present attitudes in Russia towards a monarchy, and follows the story of one Australian Romanov member who, with his wife, returns to Russia to research his heritage.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yuri Sokol, Sokol Films and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service

results.title: Rock guitar: a guide from the greats
results.creator_credit: Simon Milne, Eric Fellner and Longman Group
results.brief_description: This entertaining documentary is a guide to how to play rock guitar, especially guitar licks. Features interviews and instructional segments with ace guitarists Ron Wood (Rolling Stones), Michael Schenker, Richard Thompson and John Wilson, as well as footage of Jimi Hendrix and Chuck Berry. Includes information on how to tune a guitar and play chords, right hand technique, polishing a rhythm or solo, and advice on choosing a guitar.

results.title: Romancing the Stone (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Robert Zemeckis, Michael Douglas, El Corazon Productions and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: A best-selling romance writer, played by Kathleen Turner, gets more than bargained for when she goes to Colombia to find her kidnapped sister. There’s a mysterious man hanging around, the jungle is full of hungry crocodiles and the kidnappers are out to get her. Luckily a hero right out of her imagination (Michael Douglas) is there to rescue her…but for a price. This is a film that recalls the spirit of the old movie matinee serials.
